title: Show recently opened file at top in netrw
explanation: Set these flags to sort files my most recently modified, vim.g.netrw_sort_by = 'time' and vim.g.netrw_sort_direction = 'reverse'

title: git config --global merge.conflictStyle zdiff3
explanation: Better merge conflict handling in git version >= 2.35

title: .(dot command)
explanation: In vim, the dot command repeats last change. If you have searched for a word and want to change all occurences of it, in normal mode type cgn[word], now pressing the dot will change the next occurences on each press.

title: ; and ,
explanation: In vim, if you want to repeat the search for a character done using t, f, T or F, pressing ; does it the motion's direction and , in the opposite direction.

title: gcc --save-temps source.c
explanation: Command to see intermediate files of a C source file compilation

title: fc
explanation: Unix utility command to execute to edit the last executed command in the default editor, very helpful while getting SQL queries right.

title: entr
explanation: Run arbitrary commands when files change
